snippet.title: Skábma™ - Snowfall | Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Red Stage Entertainment proudly presents Skabma - Snowfall! Explore the Northern Wilderness with Áilu, a young reindeer herder, in this adventure inspired by indigenous Sámi stories and culture. 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1665280/Skabma__Snowfall/

Epic Game Store: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/skabma-snowfall

#indiegame #indigenous #norse #skabma

Written by Marjaana Auranen (Eira-Teresá Joret Mariánná)
Directed & Designed by Sahin Cengiz

Music by Mark Malyshev
Vocals & Yoik by Hildá Länsman

http://www.skabma.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/redstageentertainment/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/redstagefi
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/redstagefi/
